title: Pix - a customizable watchface
summary: a customizable watch face with a collection of default pictures or your own
developerAddress: 9101 W 127th Ter, Overland, Park, KS 66213, USA
description: * a customizable watch face that displays a collection of Australian pictures by Chris Blunt or from your own gallery* options to select your own photo, font, text color, size, and position* NOTE: These scenic Australian pictures are used with permission by my friend, Chris Blunt
descriptionHTML:
* a customizable watch face that displays a collection of Australian pictures by Chris Blunt or from your own gallery
* options to select your own photo, font, text color, size, and position
* NOTE: These scenic Australian pictures are used with permission by my friend, Chris Blunt
comments: Dont see app installed in phone. Cant open app via playstore. Just says uninstall. How do i change the pic?
